constituent: lean, change, person, about that time, spoon, sitting on the ground, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: Change . . . head. The key word has the sense of leaning on or toward someone or something.
koohiiStory1: Mr. T gave a girl some change to lean over and give him head.
koohiiStory2: Leaning over changes the position of the head...　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　ケイ　傾向　けいこう(tendency).
kunYomi: かたむ.く、かたむ.ける、かたぶ.く、かた.げる、かし.げる
readingExamples: 傾く (かたむ.く), 傾ける (かたむ.ける)
words: to incline toward, to slant, to lurch, to heel over, to be disposed to, to trend toward, to be prone to, to go down (sun), to wane, to sink, to decline
to incline, to list, to bend, to lean, to tip, to tilt, to slant, to concentrate on, to ruin (a country), to squander, to empty
inclination, slant, slope, bevel, list, dip
incline toward, slant, lurch, be disposed to, go down (sun), wane, sink, decline
